dcterms:creator: Alexander M Rush
Sumit Chopra
Jason Weston
dcterms:description: A large dataset containing source-summary pairs formed through pairing the first sentence of each article with its headline, used for training and evaluating abstractive sentence summarization models.
dcterms:title: Annotated Gigaword

dcterms:creator: Alexander M Rush
Sumit Chopra
Jason Weston
dcterms:description: An English dataset containing 500 documents, each with four human-generated reference summaries, used for testing abstractive summarization models.
dcterms:title: DUC2004

dcterms:creator: Baotian Hu
Qingcai Chen
Fangze Zhu
dcterms:description: A large-scale Chinese short text summarization dataset collected from the Chinese microblogging website Sina Weibo, used for training and testing summarization models.
dcterms:title: LCSTS (Large Scale Chinese Short Text Summarization)
